edu.stanford.nlp.optimization

Class SGDWithAdaGradAndFOBOS<T extends Function>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.optimization.SGDWithAdaGradAndFOBOS<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasEvaluators, Minimizer<T>

    public class SGDWithAdaGradAndFOBOS<T extends Function>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Minimizer<T>, HasEvaluators
    Stochastic Gradient Descent With AdaGrad and FOBOS in batch mode. Similar to SGDMinimizer, regularization is done in the minimizer, not in the objective function. This version only does batch optimization. For online variant, see SparseAdaGradMinimizer.java
    Author:
    Mengqiu Wang
